tablerow.td: Pushed back. Opponent is pushed away from the attacker. Attacker chooses where.
Left Arm. Save versus willpower or drop what they are holding.
Right/Favoured Arm. Save versus willpower or drop what they are holding.
If the attack hits the defender makes an armour save. Armour Broken Reduce armour class by half the armours AC Bonus.
Dazzling display. Opponent makes a morale test.
Head. Defender dazed unless they are wearing a helmet.
Called shot. Attacker chooses a special hit location.
